changelogversion.changelogtext: Automatic generation for most of the library dependencies.
Adding Material Design icons, palettes, and themes.
Design adjustments for the transaction entry form.
Standardizing icon size and color.
Improved styling for buttons.
Using switches in preference screens.
Redesigned Budget Edit screen.
Immediately apply changes to app language and colour theme.
Correcting a few minor issues.
Migrating existing database to the Database Metadata format.
Passcode improvements.
Storing remote change date per database file.
Removing minification to resolve issues on MIUI ROMs.
Updating used libraries.
Reducing the app file size.
Updating multiple libraries and adapting code.
Using delayed sync instead of upload to avoid conflicts.
Showing a notification on sync conflicts.
Showing a progress bar only when the database is being downloaded.
Correction: Processing recurring transaction after entry.
Rewriting the behaviour of the home screen on device rotation.
Using matching themes for date picker and calendar view.
Preview of the calendar view for recurring transactions.
Adding a sync indicator in the toolbar. Active only during synchronization.
Using a service for delayed upload to ensure execution.
Sync adjustment on start, not displaying the progressbar.
Adjustment for passcode on Android N (crypto provider is deprecated).
Faster file list retrieval from the cloud.
Additional stabilization through automated testing.
Resolving the metadata exceptions during synchronization by retrying the request.
Synchronization algorithm rewritten and improved to handle conflicts.
Adding a preference for synchronization on start.
Improving the process and feedback during database creation.
Improving currency import.
Improving background database comparison and transfer.
Improving the price download speed for Morningstar provider.
Sorting portfolio by symbol.
Using a different file-picker. This should resolve crashes.
Minor improvements in the Passcode settings.
Completed the new Welcome wizard.
Adding a new library for font icons.
Comprehensive initialisation options for new installations.
Delayed upload rewritten as a background service.
Stability improvements.
Redoing the Tutorial display logic.
Quick database switching. No need to restart the app anymore.
Adding dependency injection on price downloader for Morningstar.
Adding a file picker for opening a database.
Updating CloudRail library.
Correcting the auto-sync trigger.
Restoring charts library to the last stable version.
Support for Android 7 (N)
Updating CloudRail library to v2.6.1
Plenty of small fixes and error handling.
Updating the sync library. Plus a few improvements in handling authentication credentials and resetting the sync preferences.
Improving category list level indicator, simplifying selection with one tap, styling.
Stability improvements.
Updated translations.
Synchronizing the file immediately when the remote file location changes.
Separate preferences for stock and currency exchange rate providers.
Improving the new Asset Allocation form.
Updating CloudRail library. This should resolve most of the sync issues identified so far.
New Asset Allocation form.
Adding previous/next date pickers.
New preference for sorting the transactions.
Updating libraries.
Various stability improvements.
Note: There are BIG changes in this release! This release includes support for four major cloud storage providers: Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and Box.
Dropbox synchronization now can use a file anywhere in the file tree and is not limited to the app folder.
Dropbox is deprecating API v1 and therefore you will need to reinitialize synchronization.
Fix for setting the default currency on the first run.
Fix for deleted split category.
Showing only one amount field on Transfers in the same currency.
Adding Morningstar as the security price provider.
